name: Claude Code Bridge
description: Control Claude Code from chat platforms via OpenClaw

model.description: Default Claude model to use. Can be overridden per-invocation. If omitted, uses Claude CLI default.

allowedTools.description: List of Claude Code tool names to allow (e.g. ["Bash", "Read", "Write"]). If omitted, uses Claude Code defaults.

env.description: Extra environment variables passed to the Claude Code process (e.g. {"ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL": "https://...", "ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN": "sk-..."})
